project.name: awe6
project.description: Pronounced "awesome"; awe6 is game inverted: a scalable, flexible and approachable tool to assist in the rapid development of quality games.
project.version: Haxe 2.09 compatible release. Many improvements, optimizations and consistency reviews. Some breaking changes documented here: http://code.google.com/p/awe6/wiki/ReleaseNotes
